title: Banks Are Quietly Testing a New Digital Dollar — And It’s Closer Than You Think
content: Banks in the US are quietly testing the digital dollar, a new form of money that could change how payments, banking, and privacy work. Learn what the digital dollar is, why it matters, how it works, and how it could affect you.
